dict.acceptation: 电话；电话机；（电话机的）话筒；受话器；
以电话传送（消息），给（某人）打电话；用电话与（某人）交谈；

sent.orig: Each fire special use telephone extension telephone Shan Zhan group, telephone jack each Lou Zhan group.
sent.trans: 每一消防专用电话分机单占一路，电话插孔每栋楼占一路。

sent.orig: Can connect normal telephone, cordless telephone, facsimile machine, computer modem.
sent.trans: 可连接普通电话，无绳电话，传真机，电脑调制解调器。

sent.orig: Installation of 462 telephone, mobile telephone radio 53, radio and television coverage of 100%.
sent.trans: 安装有线电话462部，无线电话53部，广播电视覆盖率达100%。

sent.orig: French telephone network fully electronic, is the world's most modern telephone network one.
sent.trans: 法国的电话网络全电子是世界上最现代的电话网络。

sent.orig: The telephone directory gives people's names, addresses, and telephone numbers.
sent.trans: 电话号码薄中列有电话用户的姓名、住址和电话号码。
